official_title: A bill relating to the duty-free entry of certain scientific equipment imported for the use of the Ellis Fischel State Cancer Hospital, Columbia, Missouri.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to reliquidate as duty-free specified entries covering scientific equipment for the use of a named cancer hospital in Missouri.

titles.title: A bill relating to the duty-free entry of certain scientific equipment imported for the use of the Ellis Fischel State Cancer Hospital, Columbia, Missouri.
